cause.description:
All across the USA and the world, pets are beaten, mistreated and left unfead for days. Thousands of Animals die yearly from mistreatment. We need your help to stop it!
1. Pets are helpless against mistreatment.
2. Pets need our help for love and care.
3. Pets are God's creatures, too.
4. You have no reason not to join this cause!
cause.name: Protect Pets From Animal Cruelty
